content.label:
So I downloaded on my iPad (large file for videos I‚Äôm sure) at 11:00 at night ‚Äújust to try it out.‚Äù  Four hours later!  Fun to try and match videos.  I think I‚Äôve got the overall story figured out, but still fun to see the ‚Äúfiller‚Äù videos.  First challenge was trying to determine what was the first and the last video.

Problem:  no sound on my iPhone8, but experience is better on iPad.

As I mentioned in metacritic before there are so many advantages for this game Sam Barlow is a master of story tellings and I really wanna see this man working on the Silent Hill franchises again and the acting and the atmosphere of this game is cosy and has a relaxed ambiance with dark materials .

title.label: Too much staring at a silent screen

content.label: I really liked the first game, but this one requires you to sit and stare in silence for long periods of time as the on-screen character ‚Äúlistens‚Äù to whomever they‚Äôre video chatting with. I don‚Äôt have that kind of time to waste and it can be quite boring at times. Another annoyance was the fact that most of the videos did not start at the beginning, so before you could watch them, you have to rewind, which took too much time. It‚Äôs a bummer because I can tell a lot of thought and effort went into the game, but it was a waste of $6.99 for me because my ‚Äúplay-time‚Äù is limited and I don‚Äôt want to spend what little time I do have rewinding videos and staring at a silent screen.

I loved Her Story, but this game is pain of rewinding videos all the time. It‚Äôs so inconvenient and I gave up.

Would love to continue playing if the authors do something about rewinding though.

title.label: Absolutely hooked from start and still 10+ hours later!!

content.label:
Important Note: After over 10 hours play time, the game suddenly started crashing repeatedly on startup, impeding all further progress. I was driven mad trying to figure out why and thinking I had lost all that time and might have to start over... I even came and wrote a one star review detailing this issue as unacceptable (which it would be)... BUT I figured out the issue has something to do with Bluetooth audio! I play almost all my iPad games with audio going through Bluetooth to my headset. Never had a problem with it. After I left my review here, I decided to try a few more random things to get the game to avoid crashing, and one of those things was turning off the iPad‚Äôs Bluetooth and viola, game started up and allowed me to continue playing without any further issue... WHEW!

Devs, please look into this as a possible need to patch; most people who experience a problem like this would likely not troubleshoot as much as I have to get around it.

Now that the problem is solved and the crashing has stopped, I‚Äôve been able to return to playing with Bluetooth on and have happily been back to obsessing about these characters and this enrapturing story!
Big fan of Her and the storytelling platform. Not sure if others experienced the same, but got to the end of the story in under 30 minutes. Wish it was longer.
I‚Äôve tried playing this game on my iPhone 8 Plus and iPhone 11 Pro Max. The sound doesn‚Äôt work.

But gave it 5 stars right away based off the originality. It seems pretty intuitive so far, but Is a game like none I remember playing. Not sure it will last that long but def High praise for something totally different
All you can do is watch the people! You cant do anything! Its a waste of money :/
Wow.  What a fun ride.  I enjoyed host of things about this game. Please make more!
Interesting game but can‚Äôt get through it as it keeps crashing.

I love Her Story. I couldn‚Äôt enjoy Telling Lies. The vast majority of the game is watching one side of a random two-sided conversation, which means lots of silence. The game starts you in the middle of these random videos, forcing you to manually (and slowly) rewind them if you want the full video. And even after piecing the story together, it just wasn‚Äôt exciting like Her Story was. This nonlinear format worked amazingly for Her Story, here I just found it annoying and tedious.

This game is Terrible , why they keep making games that are too difficult 
The App Floerence was Better üò¢

I kinda got unmotivated when I noticed the videos are like 5 minutes each, but the most annoying part is the slow rewinding system, Half of the game is just rewinding. It might be an interesting story but I‚Äôll never know I guess, I‚Äôll just go to YouTube, check the ending and move on with my life.
I want to finish this (potentially) awesome game

The graphics are the only thing that is great about this game. This game is confusing af. They don‚Äôt really show you how to play or what you are even doing. The game ended and I still don‚Äôt know what the story was about. I am utterly confused and so annoyed that I payed $7 for this. I will try and get a refund, I don‚Äôt even care about the money I just want this game removed from my memories. NOT WORTH EVEN $1!!

Love the way the story unfolds between each player. However, like most players have stated the function to rewind and fast forward needs to have a 30 second function. It is just a tedious action when you need to go back or forward past a certain point. 
However, it is a great game. Story superb. Actors and Actresses are on point. The game in all just needs the functionality of the game to be a little more fast paced.

Horrible. If you were selling me a short story I would be like cool some decent acting in here (a bit) and interesting. But as a interactive ‚Äúgame‚Äù all you do is see a bunch video and wonder what‚Äôs gonna happen then it‚Äôs over! I fell asleep I was so bored waiting for something to happen then to wake up and ‚Äúplay‚Äù for two more mins to find it‚Äôs over, I couldn‚Äôt believe it. What a rip!
...I wasted 6.99 and 20 minutes of my life on this before deleting it.

Yeah. So the acting is great (despite the overacting done by Logan Marshall-Green‚Äôs eyebrows), and the storyline interesting albeit all over the place. That‚Äôs about where any fondness ends. 

One man, three women, and hours wasted watching (really more time was spent rewinding, which has to be the most irritating aspect of the game) stories which never really collide. The goal of solving a mystery isn‚Äôt quite present, unlike ‚ÄòHer Story‚Äô, and it frankly ruins the game entirely. Very disappointing. And the endings? What utter crap. I almost feel more robbed seeing those endings than I did when there was no ending at all. Ugh.

And perhaps I missed something, but I didn‚Äôt see any way to jump to the beginning of a video without having to waste time on the slowest rewind feature since VHS. So annoying it made me want to give up several times (if I could have found a decent summary online, I would have quit solely for this reason like thirty minutes in). 

Meh.

title.label: This is the best Solitaire app money can buy

content.label: I hope you don‚Äôt have ocd over uneven things ;)

It‚Äôs a decent mystery game. Putting the story together is fun, but it can be frustrating if you can‚Äôt figure out what to search for. Not a game that‚Äôll keep you on the edge of your seat but one that‚Äôll keep you interested for a little.

I like the idea of the game. I see that a lot of work and creativity went into it. One of the things that bugs me is the one sided conversations, I really wish it was possible to open two windows to watch the conversations instead of trying to remember a 3-7 minute convo, finding the related video it goes with and listen and try to remember what the person you‚Äôre watching now is responding to and the questions being asked or the answers. It‚Äôs a lot of going back and forth. The next HUGE problem, which I will get my money back for being unplayable and broken, is the crashing. After about a couple of minutes the game crashes. Open it back up and you‚Äôre stuck in a crash loop that will never resolve itself. Close out the program in the game computer stops the crash but as soon as you play a video you‚Äôre back in the crashing loop. Only temporary fix is uninstalling and reinstalling the game but you have to start over and all my notes got deleted. So no kind of local or cloud save. Could be fun, nice change of pace, no saving and horrible bugs that makes the game unplayable.

Update: So doing as the developers suggested, I emailed them my problem, my phone version and software version....Still no answer and it‚Äôs been a week now. How do you expect people to ‚Äúenjoy‚Äù your ‚Äústory game‚Äù when none of the story makes any sense. I get you have to piece together your own story and what not but what‚Äôs the point when IT DOES NOT WORK? Not so much as a automated message from them like most developers. Garbage!!

title.label: Trying to get through this ‚Äúgame‚Äù but I‚Äôm bored...

content.label:
I pre ordered the game, mainly because I love mystery games and it seemed promising and an overall interesting concept. I started playing and the game play is pretty vague and you just kind of figure it out. Which isn‚Äôt bad, I‚Äôve played games like this before. However, it can get a little boring and tedious. It‚Äôs hard to piece together the video calls when you can only hear one side of a conversation at a time. Like, I wish there was a way to see the video calls synced once you find the other half. Also, the forward and rewind process is ridiculously slow! Omg. I search a word and it brings me to the end of 7 mins video call and it take me soooo long to rewind to the beginning. Most importantly though, I have no idea how to ‚Äúwin‚Äù this game. Like is there a real objective. There are no like check points or rewards for finding something out. Idk if I‚Äôm evening doing it right. It‚Äôs kind of irritating. I play for like 20 mins and then I get bored and frustrated and play another time. I wanna complete the game but it‚Äôs getting hard to keep my interest. 

Overall, the concept seemed promising but the execution is not ideal. I want to like this game but I‚Äôm having hard time getting myself into it. Usually I‚Äôm hooked by this point with games like this. Maybe it‚Äôs just me? Hopefully I can complete the game and enjoy the work I put into. But I‚Äôm feeling doubtful.
This game is not even a game. I love story driven games but this story is absolutely confusing. I finished the game with out given the footage needed to understand what happened.

title.label: Only a Few Issues in an Otherwise Perfect Experience

content.label:
Scrubbing is the issue... we need a ‚Äúrestart video‚Äù button or 30 second skip. 

I dove in for an hour the other night before vacation and I am afraid I uncovered most of the plot. I hope not, I‚Äôll play more today... but so far it was very easy to unlock everything. A few key words and you‚Äôre suddenly down the rabbit hole.

I hope there is more to the plot than what I‚Äôve already figured out, but I love the game. The production, the gameplay, the person in the monitor is awesome. 

Great stuff, WAY worth your time and money.

Wow, this is just so good.  The story is excellent, and the acting is superb and totally believable. It is so rewarding to slowly unravel the stories and begin to see how they fold together. Her Story was ground-breaking. This one is every bit as good.

and keep going until it all comes together. I love the way Annapurna is taking storytelling and gaming to a whole new level. As a gamer AND storyteller this was a fun new way of interacting and participating in a world that is unknown and out of the box. Great cast, casting, imagination... go for it!

title.label: You had me at creator of Her Story

content.label: I LOVED the experience of playing Her Story. It‚Äôs such a rich story with a genuine sense of discovery from the manual searching. I am so very happy to get to relive that sense of discovery with a new narrative.
Compelling game so far. However I‚Äôve been getting constant crashing on my iPad Pro 12.9. Currently can‚Äôt continue at all.

Let me start off by saying that I was a big fan of Her Story. 

This one just doesn‚Äôt do it for me. It‚Äôs great if you like watching a movie out of order while only hearing half the dialogue. You get to spend half of your time fast forwarding through 30 seconds of some dude making reaction eyebrows into the camera.

Once we‚Äôve discovered both halves of a conversation, why can‚Äôt we play them simultaneously?

So far so good!!! I‚Äôm still trying to connect the dots to this masterpiece of a game. This is really for 17 and older honestly, but the stories by these characters conversations are interesting or either touching to some point. I had to read the directions on paper within the game to learn how to play because it could get a bit difficult putting the pieces together. The gameplay is awesome without any flaws, touch responsiveness is on par without any complaints, video quality is superb..no blurry effects (on iPhone 8 anyways) and the acting is very good also with smooth performance. More downloads and ratings needed for this gem!!
